Performance

Theoretical Speedup

We use Gustafsonâ€™s Law to calculate speedup:

Running 8 p2.xlarge instances as worker nodes gives . We can then calculate the speedup for the two steps of our calculations.

  1. Create bounding boxes with NNs (fully parallelizable, store boxes in s3)
    2. $$S = 8 + (-7)0 = 8$$
  2. Compute analytics from bounding boxes in Spark: 8 workers, 2 cores per worker, 2 threads per core
    3. $$S=32$$
